title: OAEP is less vulnerable to padding oracle attacks than PKCS#1 v1.5 padding. GCM is also protected against padding oracle attacks.

title: Decryption can be performed by first retrieving the length of the encapsulated key and then by retrieving the encapsulated key. The encapsulated key can then be decrypted using the RSA private key that forms a key pair with the public key. After that the AES/GCM encrypted ciphertext can be decrypted to the original plaintext.
